xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 12 Sekkhattika » 12.1 Paṭiccavāra » 12.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 12.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Sekkhattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
6.
1671Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate nava. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1672Anulomaṃ.
